gasContract.terms: For full terms and conditions applicable to this offer, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/termsandconditions
gasContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: 5,000 bonus Qantas Points are applied once Red Energy becomes responsible for the supply of your Gas and 2 Qantas Points per $1 on your bill, when you pay in full. T&Cs at www.redenergy.com.au/qantas-business-terms-and-conditions

Carbon Neutral Gas is certified by Climate Active and is an optional add-on charged at an additional rate of 0.242 cents per MJ inc GST and may be varied or ended by notice under relevant laws. See www.redenergy.com.au/carbon-neutral-gas

eligibility.information: Only available to new business customers who provide an ABN and have a valid Qantas Business Rewards membership. To be eligible to earn Qantas Points the ABN on your energy account must match the ABN registered to your Qantas Business Rewards membership.

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
